decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1307_p-02 revision C, dated 18-01-16, received 19/01/2016; 1307_p-04 revision C, dated 18-01-16, received 19/01/2016; 1307_p-03 revision C, dated 18-01-16, received 19/01/2016; 1307_p-07 revision B, dated 18-01-16, received 19/01/2016; 1307_p-06 revision C, dated 18-01-16, received 19/01/2016; Design and Access Statement Revision A, dated January 2016, received 19/01/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions and detahced building hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of one single storey guest house, erection of a part single part two storey extension creating a new entrance together with other minor extensions to allow for stair lifts
